name: Roblox AREO (Roblox Aqua)
description:
A transparent aero glass theme

REQUIRES DARK MODE TO BE ENABLED

If you find any issues.. please send feedback.

user.name: PainfulColour
user.about: Develops styles for the game ROBLOX.
